Mustex: No but if they don't immediatly offer a treaty when we show up 
we might as well count them as enemies and slag them while they're 
small.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Thunderstorm: What? They declared war already? Who the slag are 
they?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Mustex: That's where you come in.  We blow them apart
> > and salvage their base circuit by circuit.
> >

> > > don't see how 
> > > useful it can be to have only cats in a group. They
> > > won't have the 
> > > forces needed to oppose airborne troops, let alone
> > > fight a bomber...
